ygData.subject: Re: Unicorn horn
ygData.msgSnippet: no sh*t sherlock here have a cookie He said the screenshot showed wind instrument and greater lightstone when it does not. You are stating the obvious as I
ygData.messageBody:
no sh*t sherlock
here have a cookie

He said the screenshot showed wind instrument and greater lightstone when it
does not. You are stating the obvious as I said in the past I use it as my
wind instrument. I stated I don't know if it's a lightsource because I've
always had other lightsources equipped at one time or another, and frankly
could care less if a wind instrument IS a light source. Pointless post my
friend.

-Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Quellious of the 50th Chorus
-Stace Stormraven
Druid of Tunare of the 26th Circle
Veeshan Server


>From: SteelWolf <steelwolf@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Unicorn horn
>Date: Sat, 04 Dec 1999 11:12:01 -0500
>
>It works as both a wind instrument and a greater lightstone. The Crown
>of the Frogluk Kings doesn't say "Effect: Greater Lightstone" either,
>and yet when it is worn it's quite obvious that effect is on it as
>you've indicated. Checking whether it works as an instrument was simple.
>Can it be equipped in melee #2? yes. Does playing Shari's Sonorous
>Clouding with it equipped invis you? yep. There you go, works as a wind
>instrument.
>
>Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana
>
